import React from "react" import "./Books.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" export const BookCard = ({book})=> { return(

{ book.title }

{book.author}

genre: {book.genre}
signed: {book.signed ? "SIGNED!!!" : "Not signed"}
read: {book.read ? "Read it!" : "To Be Read"}

{ book.title }

) }
